message.pattern: <@DATE_TIME_SYSLOG:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> nagios: SERVICE ALERT: <@WORD:host@>;<@WORD:service@>;<@WORD:status@>;<@WORD:criticity@>;<@NUMBER:nb_check@>;<@STRING:msg@>
<@DATE_TIME_SYSLOG:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> nagios: <@REGEXP("Warning"):criticity@>: <@REGEXP("Message queue contained results for service .+ on host .+. The service could not be found!"):msg@>
<@DATE_TIME_SYSLOG:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> nagios: <@REGEXP("Auto-save of retention data completed successfully."):msg@>
<@DATE_TIME_SYSLOG:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> nagios: <@WORD:type@> NOTIFICATION: <@WORD:dest@>;<@WORD:host@>;<@WORD:service@>;<@WORD:status@>;<@WORD:notify-by@>;<@STRING:msg@>
<@DATE_TIME_SYSLOG:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> nagios: <@WORD:type@> NOTIFICATION: <@WORD:dest@>;<@WORD:host@>;<@STRING:status@>;<@WORD:notify-by@>;<@STRING:msg@>
<@DATE_TIME_SYSLOG:timestamp@> <@WORD:nagios_server@> nagios: EXTERNAL COMMAND: PROCESS_SERVICE_CHECK_RESULT;<@WORD:host@>;<@WORD:service@>;<@NUMBER:status@>;<@STRING:result@>
<@DATE_TIME_SYSLOG:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> nagios: <@REGEXP("Warning: Attempting to execute the command .+ resulted in a return code of 127.+"):msg@>
<@DATE_TIME_SYSLOG:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> nagios: <@REGEXP("Warning: Host .+ has no services associated with it!"):msg@>
<@DATE_TIME_SYSLOG:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> nagios: <@REGEXP("Warning: Host .+ is not a member of any host groups!"):msg@>
<@DATE_TIME_SYSLOG:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> nagios: <@REGEXP("Warning: Contact .+ is not a member of any contact groups!"):msg@>
<@DATE_TIME_SYSLOG:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> nagios: HOST ALERT: <@WORD:host@>;<@WORD:status@>;<@WORD:criticity@>;<@NUMBER:nb_check@>;<@STRING:msg@>
<@DATE_TIME_SYSLOG:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> nagios: <@REGEXP("LOG ROTATION: \S+"):msg@>
<@DATE_TIME_SYSLOG:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> nagios: <@REGEXP("Nagios \S+ starting... (PID=\d+)"):msg@>
<@DATE_TIME_SYSLOG:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> nagios: <@REGEXP("Caught SIGTERM, shutting down..."):msg@>
<@DATE_TIME_SYSLOG:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> nagios: <@REGEXP("Caught SIGHUP, restarting..."):msg@>
<@DATE_TIME_SYSLOG:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> nagios: <@REGEXP("EXTERNAL COMMAND: .+"):msg@>
<@DATE_TIME_SYSLOG:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> nagios: <@REGEXP("Warning: .+ is not used in any .+ definitions or .+ escalations!"):msg@>
<@DATE_TIME_SYSLOG:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> nagios: <@REGEXP("Warning: A system time change of \d+ seconds .+ has been detected.+"):msg@>
<@DATE_TIME_SYSLOG:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> nagios: <@REGEXP("Successfully shutdown.+"):msg@>
<@DATE_TIME_SYSLOG:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> nagios: <@REGEXP("Error: Failed to grab configuration information for retention data"):msg@>
<@DATE_TIME_SYSLOG:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> nagios: <@REGEXP("Error: Unable to update status data file .+"):msg@>
<@DATE_TIME_SYSLOG:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> nagios: <@REGEXP("Error: Cannot open main configuration file .+"):msg@>
<@DATE_TIME_SYSLOG:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> nagios: <@REGEXP("Error: Invalid .+"):msg@>
<@DATE_TIME_SYSLOG:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> nagios: <@REGEXP("Error: Could not add object property in file .+"):msg@>
<@DATE_TIME_SYSLOG:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> nagios: <@REGEXP("Bailing out due to .+"):msg@>
<@DATE_TIME_SYSLOG:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> nagios: <@REGEXP("Error: Could not create external command file .+"):msg@>
<@DATE_TIME_SYSLOG:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> nagios: <@REGEXP("Warning: Host check command .+ for host .+ timed out after \d+ seconds"):msg@>
<@DATE_TIME_SYSLOG:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> nagios: <@REGEXP("Error: Template .+ specified in service definition could not be not found.+"):msg@>
<@DATE_TIME_SYSLOG:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> nagios: <@REGEXP("Error: Could not register .+"):msg@>
<@DATE_TIME_SYSLOG:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> nagios: <@REGEXP("Error: .+ is NULL"):msg@>
<@DATE_TIME_SYSLOG:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> nagios: <@REGEXP("nss_ldap: could not connect to any LDAP server .+"):msg@>
<@DATE_TIME_SYSLOG:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> nagios: <@REGEXP("Warning: Return code .+ for check of service .+ was out of bounds.+"):msg@>
<@DATE_TIME_SYSLOG:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> nagios: <@REGEXP("Error: Cannot open .+ file .+ for reading!"):msg@>
